content: Take down the next two bull guards you encounter, and look to the right to find a chest. Open it to pick up the Septenary Heartfire Pill Formula, then follow the path to the left and into the ruins.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5_Secret-Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secret - Bishui Cave Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
Take down the next two bull guards you encounter, and look to the right to find a chest. Open it to pick up the Septenary Heartfire Pill Formula, then follow the path to the left and into the ruins.
